newsitem.title: USA: Pier 1 Nov same-store sales rise 16.3 pct.
newsitem.headline: Pier 1 Nov same-store sales rise 16.3 pct.

text.p: Pier 1 Imports Inc said Thursday that sales for the four-week period ended November 30, 1996 totaled $81,989,000, an increase of 22.6 percent from $66,865,000.
Comparable store sales increased 16.3 percent from the year earlier period.

Third quarter total sales of $225,598,000 were up 18.6 percent, and same store sales grew 12.1 percent. Year-to-date sales of $661,940,000 were up 16.9 percent, and same store sales grew 10.9 percent.
